meanings.definition: A phylum of invertebrate animals with soft bodies, typically enclosed in a shell.
meanings.sent1: The mollusca in the ocean have shells to protect their soft bodies.
meanings.sent2: I learned about different types of mollusca in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The mollusca decided to throw a party inside their shells.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a mollusca, hiding its softness behind a tough exterior.
meanings.sent5: The colorful mollusca on the beach caught the children's attention.

meanings.definition: Any animal belonging to the phylum Mollusca.
meanings.sent1: The aquarium had a variety of mollusca on display.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of mollusca to learn more about them.
meanings.sent3: The mollusca family reunion was a lively event.
meanings.sent4: Her love for animals was as diverse as the mollusca in the sea.
meanings.sent5: The mollusca in the tide pools were fascinating to observe.
